article: the golden globes lived up to its reputation as the most relaxed of the major awards shows as hollywood 's leading ladies from both the movie and tv worlds chose flowing gowns , tousled hair and funky dangling earrings .
abstract: white and metallic gowns dominate a relaxed red carpet at the golden globe awards
